name: Locked N' Lunar
description:
Theme: What Goes Up Must Come Down
Your goal is to get as high as you can without dying and falling back down.

Goal: Travel to the moon
Controls: Aim and click above your character to propel yourself upwards
Don't run out of ammo - fly into ammo boxes to reload

Aim- Mouse
Shoot- Left Mouse Button
Restart Game - R
Menu- Mouse

Credits:
Eric Honas - Programming and Gameplay
Jarod Honas - Art and Misc. Programming
Jeremy Morris - Music, Sound, and Misc. Art
Nathan McClain - Menus and Screens
